title: Lambs’ liver and sweetbread with pickled spring onions and samphire
description: Lambs’ liver is great value and tasty too. Try it in this simple recipe served with Jersey Royals.
ingredients: 75g/3oz plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
600g/1lb 5oz lambs’ liver, cut into thick slices
50g/2oz butter, plus extra for the potatoes
2 sprigs fresh mint, leaves picked and finely sliced
